stimulusHtml: Country X’s government increases its spending without raising taxes. Which of the following is true about the effect on Country X’s real interest rates and its subsequent effect on Country X’s net exports?
choicesHtml: Real interest rates increase and net exports increase.
Real interest rates increase and net exports decrease.
Real interest rates increase with no change in net exports.
Real interest rates decrease and net exports increase.
Real interest rates decrease and net exports decrease.
